import React from 'react' function GraphOp(props) { const {gr,setGr,ch,st,type,setSt,setOp} = props let line const addVertex = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setOp("Graph") let id = e.target.id //tile id let coor = id.split(',') if(!(tile.strType ===""))// if tile is being used return const newGrid = gr.slice() let aile = newGrid[coor[0]][coor[1]] const aTile = newGrid[newR][newC]//child if(typeof(aTile) == "undefined" || !(aTile.strType === "")) return //tile is already being used const newTile= { ...aTile, txt:`${value}`, strType: type.TREE, strId:fullStruc.id, myKey: g.myKey +""+newC //for unique keys } newGrid[newR][newC] = newTile setGr(newGrid) const newSt = st.filter(e => !(e.id ===fullStruc.id)).slice()//list of data structures without tree myStruc[i]=[newR,newC] newSt.push({id:ch.id,type:"tree",tile:myStruc}) setSt(newSt) console.log(st) } return (
) } export default GraphOp
